title: Strategies to Enhance Learner Autonomy in Online Learning Environments

context.prior_knowledge: Basic digital literacy and fundamental concepts related to social studies
context.additional_context: Requires practical learning design considering work integration for office workers. Explores balance between autonomy and collaboration in simulation/VR environments

learning_goals: Learners can establish and execute self-directed learning plans in online environments.
Learners can maintain autonomy during collaborative processes with peers using digital tools.
Learners can make autonomous decisions when solving social problems presented in VR simulations.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
